snippet: Martin Laird and Chez Reavie golfed as a pair Friday because their third, Mark O'Meara, had withdrawn with a rib injury. They played through the trio ahead of them.
abstract: Martin Laird and Chez Reavie golfed as a pair Friday because their third, Mark O'Meara, had withdrawn with a rib injury. They played through the trio ahead of them.

headline.main: When Twosome Plays Through, Nobody Grumbles
headline.print_headline: When Twosome Plays Through, Nobody Grumbles
